metatags.title: @xterm/addon-canvas
metatags.description: An addon for [xterm.js](https://github.com/xtermjs/xterm.js) that enables a canvas-based renderer using a 2d context to draw. This addon requires xterm.js v5+.. Latest version: 0.7.0, last published: 2 years ago. Start using @xterm/addon-canvas in your project by running `npm i @xterm/addon-canvas`. There are 17 other projects in the npm registry using @xterm/addon-canvas.
